name: Fishin' For Beats
description:
This tiny game was made during a Game Jam at the HAW Hamburg and focuses on Music and Sounds. Our Team designed a dynamic music system where the Player unlocks different parts of a song until it becomes complete.

Description

'Puffer Daddy' is a tiny pufferfish who loves to swim around to his favorite Hip Hop tracks. The more Beats he collects in a successful Combo, the bigger he grows and his song becomes complete!
But he has to watch out- Some nasty Sharks are coming to kill his vibe.

Features
  • Play as a Hip Hop loving-Pufferfish and collect Beats!
  • Dodge Sharks and try to keep your Combo up!
  • Listen to a custom made Hip Hop Loop that starts slow and becomes fuller the higher your Combo is!

Credits
  • Code and Unreal Implementation by Julian
  • Environment and Music by Nitenyta
  • Character Design, Animations and  Unity implementation by Ditzie Doodle
    • Unity Code by Stefan@DigitalPenguin
  • Game Design by the whole Team

  • SFX from freesound.org
